Rikki Wemega-Kwawu bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe n'oge a
A mụrụ ya na Febụwarị 3, 1959, n'obodo Sekondi, Ghana
Ọ bu onye na-ese ihe kemgbe 1981, ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi onwe ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Skowhegan, Maine
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu ma enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile na nchịkọta onwe ya na nke ọha, gụnyere Dutch Artotheek

Wemega-Kwawu bụ, n'okwu nke ya, "onye na-ese ihe nke ọma, na-agbanwe n'ụzọ dị mfe n'etiti ihe osise na isiokwu ndị a na-adịghị ahụ anya, n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla."  Enwere ike ịchọta nkwupụta nke onye na-ese ihe dere na weebụsaịtị nke African Encounters, ndị nnọchi anya ya n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ.
Ọrụ Wemega-Kwawu nwere njikọ nke oge gara aga na nke ugbu a
Ọ na-etinye ọtụtụ ihe nnọchianya Afrịka oge ochie n'ime nnukwu eserese ya

Ọ na-ekwu, sị: "Na-enweta n'elu akwara nke ihe osise okpukpe Afrịka oge ochie, ebumnuche m n'ọrụ m bụ ngosipụta ihe atụ nke usoro ime mmụọ na ihe ọmụma ime mmụọ iji nwetaghachi ike furu efu nke nka ọdịnala Afrịka
A makwaara ya dị ka "onye na-ese ihe" ma na-akwalite iji mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na nka ọhụụ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ndị na-ekwu maka mmetụta nke ijikọ ụwa ọnụ na mba ofesi na nka Afrịka.
E tinyere eserese ya Ashanti Saga na ihe ngosi "Artists Speak" na San Diego Museum of Man, na ngosi site na Mee 2007 ruo Febụwarị 28, 2008.
Wemega-Kwawu na-edekwa banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọchịchị aka ike nke ọdịbendị na nyocha nke nka Afrịka nke oge a.
